div.span: District Updates: Schools Closed Indefinitely-Distance Learning Continues
div.div: For more information, please navigate to the District's COVID-19 Update page for the latest announcements and news.read more ❯

article.class: post-6211 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-district-news category-headlines entry

header.h1: Update! Food Support & Meal Distribution Plan during School Closure

p.strong: If your family needs food support during our school closing…..

div.p: For Students who receive Free or Reduced Lunch

p.strong: Packed lunches will be distributed at ….

p.em: No one will be denied a meal

p.strong: If your family needs additional food support…

div.p: If you feel that you will need food support during our school closure, please let us know and based on availability we will arrange for food delivery for your family.
Please call Karen Weiland at: 973-762-5600, X1850 or email: kweiland@nullsomsd.k12.nj.us
Please leave your name and phone number and we will contact you with details. Please speak slowly and clearly & please repeat your phone number twice.
If you request food support we will share your contact information with a community volunteer who will make a food delivery to your home.
The SOMSD community is a family & we support each other during challenging times.

p.strong: Si fanmi ou bezwen sipò manje pandan lekòl fèmen…

hr.p: Pou timoun ki resevwa manje mid (gratis ok pri redwi). Yap distruba manje nan:….
Centre Paran ap prepare yon plan pou lekòl fèmen.
Si ou santi ke w ap bezwen sipò manje fè nou konnen epi nou pral fè aranjman pou yon delivre manje pou fanmi ou.
Rele Karen Weiland. nan: 973 762 5600 Ext: 1850; imèl: kweiland@nullsomsd.k12.nj.us
Tanpri kite ou non ak nimewo telefòn ak non pou nou kap kontakte ou avèk detay. Tanpri pale dousman epi byen klè & tanpri repete nimewo telefòn omwen de fwa.
Si ou mande sipò pou manje nou pral bay enfòmasyon kontak ou a yon volontè nan kominote a ki pral fè yon delivre manje lakay ou.
Kominote SOMSD se yon fanmi & nou sipòte chak lòt pandan moman difisil yo.

p.strong: Si su familia necesita ayuda alimentaria durante el cierre de nuestros colegios….

hr.p: Para estudiantes que reciben almuerzos gratis o reducido.

p.em: A nadie se le negará una comida

hr.p: Si cree que necesitará ayuda alimentaria durante el cierre de nuestros colegios, por favor déjenos saber y organizaremos una entrega de alimentos para su familia.
Por favor llame a Karen Weiland – 973-762-5600, X1850 o mande un correo electrónico a kweiland@nullsomsd.k12.nj.us
Por favor, deje su nombre y número de teléfono y nos pondremos en contacto con usted con detalles. Hable despacio y con claridad y repita su número de teléfono dos veces.
Si solicita ayuda alimentaria, compartiremos su información de contacto con un voluntario de la comunidad que hará una entrega de alimentos a su hogar.

La comunidad SOMSD es una familia y nos apoyamos mutuamente en
tiempos difíciles.

div.p: The South Orange & Maplewood School District is committed to making our content accessible to all members of the public, including those with disabilities. This includes parents, students, employees, and all others associated with our district. If you need assistance in accessing materials on the district website or you would like to provide feedback or file a complaint about the website, please email the webmaster.

The mission of the South Orange Maplewood School District is to empower and inspire each student to explore and imagine, to pursue personal passions, and to collectively create a better future by creating a learner-centered environment through multiple pathways; re-imagined structures, systems and supports; innovative teaching; partnering with families; and maximizing community expertise and resources.

p.span: 525 Academy Street, Maplewood, New Jersey 07040 • Ph:(973) 762-5600 • Copyright © 2019, South Orange - Maplewood Public Schools. All rights reserved
